params.param: The directory containing the fastq files.
The relative path to the directory containing the cutadapt results.
The relative path to the directory containing the bowtie results.
The relative path to the directory containing the featureCounts results.
The relative path to the directory containing the DESeq2 results.
The sequence of the adapter to remove.
The directory to put the adapter-removed files.
The directory path containing the Bowtie index.
The path to the .gff file of the reference genome
The path to the .tsv file with the file names of the samples, conditions and labels.

tasks.task:
if [ ! -d "${outDir}${ctdOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the cutadapt results" mkdir -p ${outDir}${ctdOut}/ else echo "${ctdOut} already exist" fi
if [ ! -d "${outDir}${bwtOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the Bowtie results" mkdir -p ${outDir}${bwtOut}/ else echo "${bwtOut} already exist" fi
if [ ! -d "${outDir}${ftqOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the miRDeep2 results" mkdir -p ${outDir}${ftqOut}/ else echo "${ftqOut} folder already exist" fi
if [ ! -d "${outDir}${dsqOut}" ]; then echo "Creating the directory for the miRDeep2 results" mkdir -p ${outDir}${dsqOut}/ else echo "${dsqOut} folder already exist" fi
tasks.foreach: echo "Removing the adapter with Cutadapt" cutadapt \ -m 1 \ -a ${adapter} \ -o ${outDir}${ctdOut}/trimmed_${file} \ ${dataDir}/${file}

echo "Performing the alignment"
bw_fastq="${outDir}${ctdOut}/${file}" bw_output="${outDir}${bwtOut}/${file}.sam"
bowtie -S \ $(ls -1 ${bwtIndex}| head -n1 | sed 's/\..\.ebwt//' | sed 's@\(.*\)@'${bwtIndex}'\/\1@') \ ${bw_fastq} \ ${bw_output} 2>bowtie_${file}.log
bam_output="${outDir}${bwtOut}/" filebam=$(echo ${file} | sed 's/\.sam//') samtools sort "${bam_output}/${file}" > "${bam_output}/${filebam}.bam" samtools index "${bam_output}/${filebam}.bam"
tasks.task:
path_output="${outDir}${dsqOut}/"
dqCond="echo ${conditions} | rev | cut -d / -f 1 | rev | sed "s/.*/deseq_&/"" cat "${conditions}" | sed 's+trimmed_*+'"${outDir}${bwtOut}/"'&+' > "${path_output}${dqCond}"
